entry.title: Sending 'ccColor4B' (aka 'struct _ccColor4B') to parameter of incompatible type 'CIColor *'
entry.content:
升级cocos2d以后，编译项目，CCLayer.m的layerWithColor:(ccColor4B)color报错 ```objective-c

Sending 'ccColor4B' (aka 'struct _ccColor4B') to parameter
 of incompatible type 'CIColor *'

把 objective-c return [[[self alloc] initWithColor:color] autorelease]; 改成 objective-c return [[(CCColorLayer*)[self alloc] initWithColor:color] autorelease]; ``` 就可以了
